message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product that I believe will bring great value to you. After careful consideration, I've set a competitive price for it. I'm looking forward to hearing back from you.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of a lower price point. I'd like to make a counteroffer to see if we can meet in the middle.

Hello Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of a higher price point, considering the product's value. I'd like to make a counteroffer to see if we can meet in the middle.

Hello Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate the effort to meet in the middle. However, I'm still a bit short of being comfortable with the price. I'd like to make another counteroffer to see if we can finalize the deal.
Hello Bob, thank you for your revised counteroffer. I appreciate your continued effort to negotiate. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to the price, but I'd like to meet closer to the middle.
